item.description: KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#1863; 11:30PM; 10720 W Moorpark St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3pBG2OR; #TolucaLake; *Corrected Address* Twenty-six LAFD firefighters, operating in defensive mode, extinguished flames consuming a vacant one-story single-family home in 42 minutes. No reported injuries. The cause of the fire is under investigation.; FS 86; Batt 14; Valley Bureau; Council District 2; BC14 E260 E289 E76 E86 RA60 RA86 T60 T89; CH9; 17; Nicholas Prange

Structure Fire; INC#1863; 10:48PM; 10800 W Moorpark St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3XXf18a; #TolucaLake; Vacant single-family home with fire showing.; FS 86; Batt 14; Valley Bureau; Council District 2; BC14 E289 E76 E86 RA86 T89; CH9; Nicholas Prange

KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#0718; 11:38AM; 876 S Norton Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3B52VQd; #Koreatown; Twenty-four firefighters located fire in the wall of the kitchen on the first floor of a two-story home and extinguished the flames in 18 minutes. Smoke filled the first floor, as the occupants escaped with their pets. Two residents and their family canines were evaluated for smoke inhalation *as a precaution*, but were found to be in good health and further care was not needed. No reported injuries. Cause yet to be determined.; FS 29; Batt 11; Central Bureau; Council District 5; BC18 E226 E229 E26 E29 EM5 RA26 RA52 RA6 T29; CH7; 13; Nicholas Prange

Structure Fire; INC#0718; 11:20AM; 876 S Norton Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3B52VQd; #Koreatown; Two-story single-family home with fire in the wall. Offensive mode. Two patients are being treated for smoke inhalation.; FS 29; Batt 11; Central Bureau; Council District 5; BC18 E226 E229 E26 E29 E52 EM5 RA26 RA52 RA6 T29; CH9; 13; Nicholas Prange

KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire - Fatality; INC#0393; 08:34AM; 1456 W Hepner Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3FvHJWx; #EagleRock; Firefighters arrived to find a single-family home, well-involved with fire, and reports of four occupants inside and three nearby structures being exposed to heat. It took 32 firefighters 29 minutes to extinguish the flames, while protecting all neighboring structures. Three occupants escaped, but sadly, one person was found deceased inside the structure. No other residents or firefighters were injured. The fire's cause is under active investigation. PIO Firefighter David Ortiz is en route to the scene, ETA 9:30am.; FS 42; Batt 2; Central Bureau; Council District 14; AR1 AR22 AR7 BC1 BC2 CM20 CM22 E12 E201 E212 E44 E55 RA12 RA55 T1 T12; CH7; 13; Nicholas Prange

Structure Fire; INC#0393; 08:05AM; 1456 W Hepner Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3FvHJWx; #EagleRock; One-story single-family home with heavy fire showing.; FS 42; Batt 2; Central Bureau; Council District 14; BC1 BC2 E12 E201 E212 E44 E55 RA12 RA55 T1 T12; CH9; 13; Nicholas Prange

KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#1670; 09:09PM; 2127 S Malcolm Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3FklTow; West Los Angeles; It took 24 firefighters 23 minutes to fully extinguish flames that consumed a detached garage and nearby carport. Firefighters saved one canine from the burning building. No reported injuries. Cause under investigation.; FS 92; Batt 18; South Bureau; Council District 5; BC9 E237 E292 E37 E59 E71 RA59 RA92 T37 T92; CH7; 13; Nicholas Prange

Structure Fire; INC#1670; 08:46PM; 2124 S Glendon Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3OU7W3S; West Los Angeles; Detached garage with heavy fire showing, exposing a nearby structure to heat and flames.; FS 59; Batt 9; West Bureau; Council District 5; BC9 E292 E37 E59 RA59 T92; CH9; 13; Nicholas Prange

title.a: Update Multi-Patient Medical Suspected Overdose 12/01/2022 INC#0643

item.description: Update Suspected Overdose Multi-Patient Medical; INC#0643; 12:33PM; 5435 N Vesper Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3GYWbY4; #ShermanOaks; A total of 10 students (12-15 years old) were evaluated at Van Nuys Middle School for suspected overdose and found to be in mild-to-moderate distress. Seven were transported to local hospitals specializing in pediatric medicine, and three were released on scene. With 50 firefighters on scene, in coordination with LA School Police and school personnel, crews systematically searched the entire school premises including hallways, classrooms, offices, and recreation areas to ensure there were no students unaccounted for. Crews on scene confirmed that this was NOT fentanyl-related. Specifics of the medical complaints and possible substance(s) used will be completed by hospital personnel.; FS 88; Batt 10; Valley Bureau; Council District 4; AP58 AP65 AP7 BC10 BC14 CM40 CM41 CM42 E102 E288 E290 E293 E81 E88 E99 EM10 EM14 EM9 PI1 RA27 RA59 RA70 RA71 RA76 RA81 RA84 RA87 RA88 RA90 T88 T90 T93; CH8; 17; Nicholas Prange

Multi-Patient Medical; INC#0643; 10:34AM; 5435 N Vesper Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3GYWbY4; #ShermanOaks; LAFD is responding to Van Nuys Jr. High School for multiple students with medical complaints (at least 5 patients). PIO Captain Erik Scott is en route, ETA 11:50am.; FS 88; Batt 10; Valley Bureau; Council District 4; BC10 BC14 CM40 CM42 E102 E288 E290 E293 E81 E88 E99 EM10 EM14 EM9 RA27 RA59 RA70 RA71 RA76 RA81 RA84 RA87 RA88 RA90 T88 T90 T93; CH8; 17; Nicholas Prange
